Text:
Sorry for the delay but for the near future I'm too busy to can make more releases, 
so who care to join in my group and can do continuous my work, I willing to help with 
any needed but should to meet these minimum guidelines: 

- have at least a Dual Core Processor 
- more than 2 GB RAM 
- from 250 Kb UP / DL 
- over 150 GB HDD space 
.....and daily time and patience for encoding. 
So contact me on Kingdom forum!

Thanks King
